name: ROSEMIND
description:
ROSEMIND

ROSEMIND is a randomized game of hivemind conquest and takeover. Grow from a lowly flower golem to a budding hivemind while you take back your home and achieve long-forgotten stability. Free your island home from the invaders while balancing your power.

While you can play in the browser, I recommend downloading the native game below.

This is my first Godot game, and first game jam game, so, while I cannot make changes after the upload date, I'd still love feedback and suggestions!

How To Play

  • Move around the islands with WASD
  • Infest nearby golems by holding SPACE
  • Accumulate enough golems to take on the goblins, but beware your colossal size, as the islands sink faster with more weight, and goblins are more sensitive to your location!
  • Eliminate all the goblins and take over every golem without sinking an island to win!

Controls

ActionKeyboard/MouseControllerMove
WASD, Arrow-keys
Left Stick, D-Pad
AttackLeft-click, J, Z
Any Right Trigger/Button
Burrow/InfestSpaceDualShock Cross, Xbox A, Nintendo B
ZoomScroll wheel
Right Stick
Toggle Tips
T
Toggle Debug/FPS
`
Pause/QuitTab, Escape
Start, DualShock Options, Nintento +

More information in the README

Created for the 49th Godot Wild Jam Theme Wildcards
Source

EDIT: it seems the web version doesn't play nicely with the navigation, so I've disabled the web player.
